dmca.title: Illigal Software and Hotlinking, Continued Complaint
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: legal@firstclasshosting.net [mailto:legal@firstclasshosting.net] 
Posted At: Saturday, May 06, 2006 11:45 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Illigal Software and Hotlinking, Continued Complaint
Subject: Illigal Software and Hotlinking, Continued Complaint


We have contacted the Site administrator and register as stated in the
who is directory information regarding this issue. You are hosting a
account with the domain name. http://invisionfree.com/, They provide
free forums etc for everything from chat to gaming forums. They are
hosting a site for free located at this url
http://s15.invisionfree.com/ThePlace/ This free forum hosted by this
user is hotlinking to files on our servers, as well as providing several
program that are "cracked" Only one of the files they was hosting we are
authorized to delegate but there are many others who we are making aware
of the theft. The one file we are authorized to delegate is known as
D2jsp. It is a pay for program that requires a key to activate. The
authors site is located at www.d2jsp.org This site
http://s15.invisionfree.com/ThePlace
<http://s15.invisionfree.com/ThePlace/>  is providing the download as
well as a .dll file that has been rewritten to bypass the security
features in the program. We would provide the urls for the hotlinking
files but the board administrator has banned or investigation accounts
as well as blocked standard browsing of the forum. We contacted the free
forum board administrator as well as the administrator for invision free
at invfree@invisionfree.com and have seen no action. We are writing you
at copyright@theplanet.com so maybe we can get this issue resolved. This
forum is also hosting many files that just providing for download
violates our sister companies Terms of Service known as Blizzard
Entertainment or Blizzard North a Subsidiary of  Vivendi Universal
Games. We are asking this issue be resolved among the companies that are
involved but we may be required to escalate this issue further. With in
2 weeks your cooperation as well as the owner of www.invisionfree.com
will be receiving certified letters regarding this issue to the
following addresses. 
 
Invisionfree.com Administrative contact
Brandon Kopetzky 
Zathyus Networks, Inc.
P.O Box 1763
Bowie, MD  20721-1763
 
Copyright Notifications
George Poletes
Corporate Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110,
Dallas, TX 75207
 
We thank you for your time and expect your timely and delayed response
to this problem.
 
First Class Hosting
Blizzard North Entertainment
